      RedundancyScheme build() 
      RedundancyScheme.Builder setAlgorithm(RedundancyAlgorithm algorithm)
      Algorithm determines the algorithm to be used for redundancy.
      RedundancyScheme.Builder setRepairShares(short count)
      RepairShares is the minimum number of safe shares that can remain before a repair is triggered.
      RedundancyScheme.Builder setRequiredShares(short count)
      RequiredShares is the minimum number of shares required to recover a stripe, reed-solomon k.
      RedundancyScheme.Builder setShareSize(int size)
      ShareSize is the size in bytes for each erasure shares.
      RedundancyScheme.Builder setSuccessShares(short count)
      SuccessShares is the desired total number of shares for a segment.
      RedundancyScheme.Builder setTotalShares(short count)
      TotalShares is the number of shares to encode.

      • setTotalShares

        public RedundancyScheme.Builder setTotalShares(short count)
        TotalShares is the number of shares to encode. If it is larger than OptimalShares, slower uploads of the excess shares will be aborted in order to improve performance.
        Parameters:
        count -
        Returns:
        the builder
